book.pg_edition.page2: For those less fortunate who do not know why or what Project Genesis entails, below is a brief summary of the latest events and occurrences in the recent years following the catastrophe.
book.pg_edition.page3:
§lThe Catastrophe§r:

After the explosion of a research center, the surface was widely irradiated by the displacement of radioactive particles, which forced evacuation to the subway and other underground places.
